item.description:
Looking for a challenge?

How about hiking 17 miles, nearly 6,000 feet of elevation gain, and getting four 4K peaks and a NE Hundred Highest peak?

It's a long day, so we'll meet early (7am) at the Oliverian Brook trailhead on the Kancamagus Highway (Rt 112) to spot a car, then head back down the Kanc to begin our hike up Pine Bend Brook trail to the Tripyramids. Then we'll head over to the Kate Sleeper trail and across the Sleepers to Whiteface and Passaconaway and out the Oliverian Brook trail.

This hike is considered advanced due to distance, pace and elevation. To sign up for this hike, you should be an experienced hiker who has recently done trips of this length--15+ miles--and elevation gain and be able to hike faster than book time. 

Meeting time/place: 7am at the Oliverian Brook Trailhead (GPS coordinates are: N43°  59.642 | W071° 21.025) Rt 112/Kancamagus Highway - about 21 miles east of Lincoln. Google Maps indicates this is a 3 hour drive from Boston.

Dangerous weather conditions will cancel - I will post an update and/or send an email to all confirmed participants a day or two before this event.

Please answer the RSVP questions in full.

 As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you and your guests acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code described at www.hikesafe.com; the organizer(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.name: Tripyramids, Sleepers, Whiteface & Passaconaway (Advanced+)
